name: Crobat
author: Nisota Niso
flavor_text: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target’s neck.

abilities.name: Shadowy Envoy
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if you played Janine’s Secret Art from your hand this turn, you may draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Poison Fang
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1.
